legendsmpcore.mitigation.event

Class SpamBroadcastDetection

  • java.lang.Object
    • legendsmpcore.mitigation.event.SpamBroadcastDetection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.bukkit.event.Listener

    public class SpamBroadcastDetection
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.bukkit.event.Listener
    Detection of suspicious activity, only triggers with admin commands that display messages, such as /broadcast
